Represent species with points.

Represent species with points.

add_sp(p, data = NULL, fill = "sp", shape = 21, point_size = 3)

Arguments

p

A ggplot.
data

A dataframe; passed to [ggplot2::ggplot()].
fill

Character; either a colour or "sp", which maps each species to a different color.
shape, point_size

A number giving point size and shape (as in [graphics::points()]). Passed to [ggplot2::geom_point()].

See also

Other map components.: contour_elev, hide, label_elev, limit_gx_gy, map_gx_gy_elev, wrap
